<@UJQNNKKHN> is it possible to add an if statement around? if its not a module? i.e.
`{% _if_ post_excerpt %}}`
          `<div _class_="blog-post__excerpt">`
            `{% _text_ "post_excerpt" %label="Post Excerpt", value="{{`
            `content.post_excerpt }}" %}`
          `</div>`
        `{% _endif_ %}}`
